description:
This episode of Meisaku is inspired by "The Pied Piper of Hamelin." When Tsurukou plays a flute, it attracts mice. Chienetsu uses that to exterminate mice from the student council`s room. Chienetsu Harusame is voiced by Natsuki Hanae.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Pied Piper of Dragon Palace Town
